TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMappedFolder implements class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.IAnnotatedObject, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposed, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.INotifyObjectDisposing, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItem, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectMember, class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectStartupItem, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示映射到 SharePoint 中的位置的 SharePoint 项目中的文件夹。

span.span: Represents a folder in a SharePoint project that is mapped to a location in SharePoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射的文件夹是 SharePoint 项目中的 SharePoint 服务器安装的某些文件的物理位置相对应的文件夹。Mapped folders are folders in a SharePoint project that correspond to the physical location of certain files in the SharePoint Server installation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加和移除映射文件夹](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders)。For more information, see [How to: Add and Remove Mapped Folders](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-and-remove-mapped-folders). 所有文件的`BuildAction`属性设置为`Content`或`None`自动包含在输出 WSP 文件中并部署到 SharePoint 服务器。All files whose `BuildAction` property is set to either `Content` or `None` are automatically included in the output WSP file and deployed to the SharePoint server.

summary.span: 获取或设置 SharePoint 中映射文件夹映射到的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location in SharePoint to which the mapped folder is mapped.

summary.span: 此路径相对于 SharePoint 的根目录。

span.span: This path is relative to the root of SharePoint.
A string that represents a path.

exception.span: 如果路径设置为绝对路径、包含“..”，或包含非法字符，则会发生。

span.span: Occurs if the path is set to an absolute path, contains "..", or has illegal characters.

summary.span: 获取映射文件夹的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of mapped folder.

summary.span: 文件夹类型派生自 SharePoint 中常见位置的映射文件夹的位置。

span.span: The folder type derives from the location of the mapped folder for common locations in SharePoint.

value.span: 一种映射的文件夹类型。
